title: Review: The Pinarello X9 Road Bike Merges Comfort and Speed, with a Price to Match
content:
The Italian brand's latest endurance bike might just be the Pinarello you should be riding, even if it doesn't have that Dogma name.

Read the full article at Review: The Pinarello X9 Road Bike Merges Comfort and Speed, with a Price to Match on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
